basics.name: Justin Sumiye
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2027.

highlights: Implemented updates and additions to the center's website using Divi, and React, ensuring seamless user experiences and keeping the online presence current and dynamic.

Developed a PHP web application that automates the creation of decision letters for student applicants using the FPDF library. This user-friendly tool generates official decision letters with branded letterhead in PDF format, facilitating a swift and professional communication process with applicants.

Successfully rebuilt the organization's application form through integration with a third-party software, streamlining the submission process for applicants. This enhancement contributed to increased efficiency and a more user-friendly application experience.
Developed a simple trivia quiz for the Korean Culture Day event using React and Material UI

awards.title: Manoa Academic Merit Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.6.

awards.title: Outstanding Student in AP Computer Science A
